description:
go.crypto/poly1305: enable AMD64 assembly

This change alters the assembly to use FSUBD instructions such that
6l will actually emit the correct FSUBRD instructions and enables
the assembly code.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=680442a23eaf&repo=crypto ***

go.crypto/poly1305: enable AMD64 assembly

This change alters the assembly to use FSUBD instructions such that
6l will actually emit the correct FSUBRD instructions and enables
the assembly code.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 6514044: go.crypto/poly1305: enable AMD64 assembly
